name: Sakshi
greetingText: I am really excited to show you a small surprise that I made for you because
wishText: I wish you lots of happiness and best wishes, may you succeed in all aspects of your life! ;)
text2: I thought I should make it upto you in a different way
text3: But then I realised that we are programmers and therefore...
text4: I came up with this idea of wishing you in a unique way
outroText: Hope you like this birthday wish!
replayText: To replay the wish again please click or refresh the site
